description: Create a professional travel website with V1 logo using light green and white color scheme. The site should have a modern, polished aesthetic with smooth animations throughout
Implement a comprehensive destination search system where users can search for destinations and view flight and accommodation prices
Create an interactive price comparison feature that displays prices for the same destination across all 12 months of the year in a visual, easy-to-read format (like a chart or calendar view)
Add engaging animations and transitions throughout the site - for hero section, cards, search interactions, price displays, and page navigation. Make it feel premium and fluid
Design attractive destination cards showing images, prices for flights and hotels, with hover effects and smooth interactions
Create a striking hero section with search functionality that immediately captures attention and encourages users to start exploring destinations
